summary: Part of the development team of a product for a large Portuguese retailer. Focused on developing an ML methodology for sales forecasting and to predict the impact of price markdowns.

Part of the development team of [MELOA](https://www.ec-meloa.eu) as a member of the Computer Graphics and Information Systems department. Designed and developed a real time data streamer to authenticate, deliver, and load balance requests sent from IoT devices. Also designed a development kit for web apps that use MELOA's data and additional logic, using GraphQL with multiple data sources.

Assisted professors during undergraduates classes, part of FEUP's BSc. + MSc. in Informatics and Computer Engineering program. For the Computer Laboratory course, dealt mostly with implementing low-level device drivers on a VM running Minix OS. Worked on both 2017 and 2018 versions of the program. I also assisted Computer Graphics classes, a course consisting mostly of building guided projects with WebGL to learn the basics of computer graphics algorithms and structures.
Spent early university summers designing an developing websites as pro bono work. Clients ranged from Music Producers to Agricultural Companies
